Package me.bhop.bjdautilities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EditableMessage  
    Messenger
    A utility class for sending Messages with convenient helpers.
    ReactionMenu
    A chat menu created from reactions (emotes).
    ReactionMenu.Builder
    A convenient builder for creating ReactionMenus.
    ReactionMenu.GuildReactionMenu  
    ReactionMenu.Import
    A convenient way to import a ReactionMenu after a bot restart.
